title: Coffret Harry Potter en 8 tomes
description: 2016 Edition. Contains the following volumes : Harry Potter, I : Harry Potter à l'école des sorciers - grand format [ Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone - large format ]Harry Potter, II : Harry Potter et la Chambre des Secrets - grand format [ Harry POtter and the Chamber of Secrets ] - large formatHarry Potter, III : Harry Potter et le prisonnier d'Azkaban - grand format [ Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban ] large formatHarry Potter, IV : Harry Potter et la Coupe de Feu - grand format [ Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire ] large formatHarry Potter, V : Harry Potter et l'Ordre du Phénix - grand format [ Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix ] large formatHarry Potter, VI : Harry Potter et le Prince de Sang-Mele - grand format [ Harry Potter and the Half Blood Prince ] large formatHarry Potter, VII : Harry Potter et les Reliques de la Mort - grand format [ Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows ] large formatHarry Potter, VIII : Harry Potter et l'Enfant Maudit Parties un et deux
author: J.K. Rowling
